DrifterMod:SteeringWheel.NAME: Steering Wheel
DrifterMod:SteeringWheel.FLAVOR: This lucky steering wheel is a memento of cars past.
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of each combat, Retain your hand.

DrifterMod:ModdedCar.NAME: Modified '86
DrifterMod:ModdedCar.FLAVOR: A car that isn't that impressive, but in the right hands is legendary.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would draw cards while your hand is full, gain 1 #ydriftermod:Overdraw for each.
